```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(here)
library(tidyverse)
library(broom)
library(modelr)
library(ggplot2)
```

```{r message=FALSE}
dados = readr::read_tsv(here::here('./data/marioKart.txt'))
```

```{r}
dados_filter = dados %>% filter(totalPr < 100) 
totalpr_x_nbids = dados_filter %>% ggplot(aes(x = totalPr, y = nBids)) + geom_point()
totalpr_x_nbids
```

```{r}
dados_filter.lm = dados_filter %>% lm(formula = totalPr ~ nBids)
summary(dados_filter.lm)
```

```{r}
dados = dados %>% mutate(aumento = totalPr - startPr)
dados_filter = dados %>% filter(aumento < 100)
aumento_x_nbids = dados_filter %>% ggplot(aes(x = aumento, y = nBids)) + geom_point()
aumento_x_nbids
```
